features: AUTO ADJUSTS SO YOU CAN REST EASY: One touch auto mode uses a particle sensor to monitor pollutant levels and adjusts fan to ensure optimal air quality; LED indicator displays air quality status as excellent (blue), moderate (orange) or polluted (red)

CLEAN AIR IN MINUTES: Blueair’s HEPASilent dual filtration delivers up to 45% faster cleaning and up to 67% less noise than traditional HEPA filtration alone; Quickly cleans 550sqft large room in about 12.5 min or up to 2640sqft XL space in 60min, on high
RATED BEST FOR LOWEST ANNUAL ENERGY CONSUMPTION: Quieter (23 dB) than whisper on low; ENERGY STAR rated - uses less energy (4W) than an LED lightbulb on low so it’s kind to your wallet and the planet
REMOVES 99.99% OF COMMON ALLERGENS: Helps reduce allergens and pollutants that trigger allergy and asthma symptoms

REMOVES ODOR & PARTICLES DOWN TO 0.1 MICRON: Ideal for smoke & smog during wildfire season; Removes 99.97% of airborne particles like smoke, dust, viruses and pet dander, while the carbon filter traps light household odors from smoking, pets and cooking
MOST AWARDED AIR PURIFIER BRAND IN THE US: Blue Pure 211 plus Auto has won Good Housekeeping – 10 Best Air Purifiers of 2021, Best Overall Air Purifier

INDEPENDENTLY TESTED FOR PERFORMANCE & SAFETY, ZERO OZONE: AHAM Verifide for CADR; Ozone Safety Standards Certified by CARB; Zero Ozone Verified (<5 ppb) by Intertek Sustainability Program; Trusted Education Partner of British Health Professional Academy

GENUINE FILTERS FOR OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE: Replace your filter every 6 months to ensure proper functionality & only use genuine Blueair filters; Shop 211 plus Auto replacement filter: B08WWS6XSG; Upgrade to SmokeBlock filter for enhanced removal: B0B453ZDZ6
body.description: "Blue Pure 211+ Auto air purifier quickly cleans 550sqft large room in about 12.5 min or up to 2640sqft extra-large space in 60min, on high. Only Blueair air purifiers use HEPASilent™ technology, delivering maximum filtration with minimum noise. Combining mechanical filtration with electrostatic charging of particles produces clean air up to 45% faster with up to 67% less noise than traditional HEPA filtration alone. Delivers high performance with automated one-button control in a lightweight, compact package and includes a washable, pre-filter in Arctic Trail (Gray). It can also be customized in other Swedish-inspired pre-filter colors that are sold separately. Carbon filter traps light household odors from smoking, pets, cooking, and more. Award-winning, sleek, Swedish design compliments your aesthetic while working hard to clean your air so you can place where it will be most effective at capturing airborne particles & odors without worrying about it cramping your style. Independently evaluated for safety standards and third-party tested for performance as part of the AHAM Verifide® Program for air cleaners, this air purifier has a Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) of 353 for fine smoke particles, 380 for pollen particles, and 347 for dust particles.CLEAN AIR IN A MATTER OF MINUTES: Comparing CADR performance of Blueair models vs same models with only H13 HEPA. At similar CADRs, Blueair models achieved less noise than same models with only H13 HEPA. Noise refers to the dB(A) difference in acoustic power. Tested on Blue Pure 211+ Auto, DustMagnet™ 5400i, Protect 7400 series. Performance may vary. According to AHAM, air changes per hour (ACH) is the measure of the outside air volume added to a space divided by the volume of that space over a set amount of time.REMOVES ODOR & PARTICLES DOWN TO 0.1 MICRON: Blueair models with HEPASilent's mechanical and electrostatic filtration produced higher CADR, lower noise, and had lower energy consumption vs. the same models with only mechanical filtration (H13 filter). Tested on PM2.5 (0.1 - 2.5 μm) up to 90min; Tested on Influenza A (H1N1) with a minimum reduction rate of 99.99% in 60min.REMOVES 99.99% OF COMMON ALLERGENS: Tested on pollen particles 5.048 - 11.14 μm on Blue Auto, DustMagnet™ and Protect.MOST AWARDED AIR PURIFIER BRAND IN THE US: Based on survey of over 50 awards, accolades, and recommendations issued by independent consumer associations, media publications, and industry competitions from January 1, 2022, through August 16th, 2022, for products sold in the US by top 10 air purifier brands according to NPD Group Retail Tracking Service, Small Appliances, U.S. sales dollars June 2022 YTD.BACTERIA, VIRUS & MOLD SPORE REMOVAL: Tested to reduce E.coli and Influenza A (H1N1) with minimum reduction rate of 99.9% in 60min; Tested on A.niger with minimum reduction rate of 99.9% in 60min."

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed for large rooms Filters the air at a rate of approx. 4.8x an hour (or about every 12.5 minutes) in a 550 ft² room to effectively lower particle levels in large living and family rooms. Performance you can trust Independently evaluated for performance by the AHAM Verifide Program for room air cleaners with a Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) of 353 CFM smoke, 380 CFM pollen, and 347 CFM dust in 550 ft² rooms.​​ Freely place almost anywhere with 360º air intake Unlike some air purifiers with strict rules for placement, the Blue Pure 211+ Auto uses a 360-degree air intake, meaning you can place it almost anywhere in the room without compromising performance.

Previous page Fabric pre-filter The fabric pre-filter offers the first layer of protection, catching larger particles from the air.​ HEPASilent technology Electrostatic filtration works with the particle filter to remove 99.97% of airborne particles.​ Particle filter The main particle filter removes airborne allergens, like pollen, dust, pet dander, germs, and more. Carbon layer A layer of activated carbon traps light household odors from pets, cooking, and smoking.​ Next page 1 Captures large particles 2 Electrostatic filtration 3 Removes Pollutants 4 Traps odors

Low noise and energy consumption Low noise level Cleans the air with noise levels no louder than a whisper on low (23 dB) and with less noise than a normal conversation on high (56 dB). Low energy consuption ENERGY STAR certified for energy efficiency (4-38 W) - certified room air purifiers are 40% more energy-efficient than standard models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super quiet and very effective
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good air filter. I’ve tried a bunch and this one is the best. Clears out cooking smells within hours. Bought it through amazon warehouse in “like new” condition which was a great deal and came in great condition, like it was new. Only one button to push, I just leave it on auto setting. Highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works well
reviews.reviewText: Very quiet even on higher speeds. We have noted quite a reduction in dust and our sinuses are more clear. Wish we had bought one sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for a large space
reviews.reviewText: It is large, so you need a good space for it, not pressed against a wall or anything else so it can draw air. I have mine in the living room and I think it clears the air on the entire floor, including kitchen and dining room. I can hear the fan but only from less than three feet away when the room is silent. It does not bother me. But it might if it was in a bedroom. Normally it runs on low but automatically runs higher if it senses more pollution. So far that's only happened once that I've noticed in about three months, due to cooking in the kitchen. It may have produced a slight scent in the first few days but I haven't noticed anything since. Unlike some reviewers, I can't say that I've noticed any significant improvement in the air in our house. I bought it as we've been having issues with smoke from forest fires in late summers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking unit, quiet, love the auto mode - got rid of wildfire smoke from our house
reviews.reviewText: I'm in California and this past summer was bad in terms of wildfires and it's impact on our air quality. It's the first time where the smoke affected us INSIDE our house. It was so bad where we were that it was a thick fog of smoke at ground level for a week. We're working from home with kids and a dog. And there were days when we could see the smoke inside the house, meaning we could see haze inside. My wife was coughing and sneezing. I ended up buying two of these units, one for each floor of our house during the day and used one in our bedroom during the night. The auto mode feature is pretty cool and the sensor is pretty sensitive. Basically, it autodetects the air quality and adjust the fan speed accordingly. It not only detected smoke but it detected odors like fried fish that we made one night, which is pretty cool So it's good to remove cooking odors as well. I did test it out on a smoky day and it did detect poor air quality and upped the fan. Within 30 minutes it cleared out the air. Yes, these purifiers DO make a notable difference. They are not a gimmick. On the lowest fan setting they are VERY quiet and pretty unnoticeable. We had one in our bedroom on auto mode and it was whisper quiet!!! On the higher speeds the noise is more noticeable but not that bad. It definitely can move alot of air and I trust the sq. ft. rating. It can probably handle larger to be honest. Lastly, I like the nice touch sensitive touch pad with indicator lights to adjust fan speed and turn the unit on. It's pretty cool and futuristic.The CON... as with many reviewers, I can confirm there is a weird chemical like odor from the purifier itself. I think it's from the filter. After awhile you don't notice it but it is there. It's not super strong but noticeable. It's also pretty expensive. I'm sure there are other cheaper and maybe better options. I bought these in a rush as availability of other purifiers at the time was very little. We are happy with them overall and will likely continue to use them. They are a nice small form factor and fit well with our decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars To Be Seen But Not Heard
reviews.reviewText: My Blueair Purifier is a flat-out beast! The design is minimalist, yet functional. If you're looking for lots of lights and over the top techno features, this is NOT for you! But if you want a purifier that effectively cleans the air with little to no noise this is the one. And if you need to switch to beast mode to quickly clean the air, it'll blow your hair back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the Job
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air purifier about a year and a half ago for my dad because he got really sick and needed something to clean the air so I bought this for him. It works so well even still we have it on in the house 24/7 and it also has different setting with a fan. It was pricey but totally worth the money a great investment I would say. You do have to replace the filters every so often as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and uses less energy than other air purifiers
reviews.reviewText: First, a general rave about this brand: For all of my adult life, I've had air purifiers of all kinds due to seriously bad allergies. The BlueAir Blue series are the ONLY ones that I've had that are easy to clean. I had a smaller BlueAir Blue 411 for years in a small bedroom that was great! With other brands, the expensive pre-filters either had to be thrown away when they got dirty, or I had to resort to using a toothbrush to clean the plastic framework that they were a part of. I admit that because of these annoying issues, I replaced or cleaned them less often than I was supposed to. With the Blue series, you just slide off the fabric pre-filter (it's a lot like sliding off a sock), and then throw it in the washing machine. A clean pre-filter captures the larger stuff like animal hair and dust, extending the lifespan of the main filter. A clean one therefore saves you money in the long run because you won't have to replace the main filter as often. More than anything, an air purifier that has a dirty filter probably doesn't do anybody much good, regardless of the specifications on the box.Secondly, I bought this particular model because of its capacity, air quality indicator, and because it uses much less energy than other air purifiers (only 4-38 watts). I keep it running 24/7 in a large bedroom, so energy use and noise are important. When it's in Auto mode, it comes on only when its sensors detect particles in the air, and triggering the air quality indicator LED to subtly let you know. When it's in Night mode, all of the lights on the unit turn off, it's whisper quiet, and the fan is on Low. It also has an Everyday mode (It's equivalent to a Medium setting), and a Boost mode (a High setting). It does an impressive job of cleaning the air, as well. My sinuses really appreciate it!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Efficient purifier, good appearance, easy filter replacement, cumbersome controls.
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier improved air quality discernably in our 2-bedroom condo during the recent choking wildfire smoke. Glad we bought it. Very quiet in night mode and acceptable during higher settings. The HEPA filters can be replaced easily however they are still okay after about 100 hours of use in the medium speed setting and with closed windows. The touch controls are neatly integrated and unobtrusive however we would prefer simpler ergonomic buttons or nobs located on the side because it is not easy to find the right setting without numerals or idiot dots. Please redesign the controls to earn 5 stars.

Bought when the forest fires were burning through alberta this spring. Filters out the smoke smell. Left it on in eco mode. Very quite. After 2 weeks, I found that the air particles I seen in the sunlight were all gone!It did an incredible job. As an important side note, I live in a house without children or pets. So might have to ask other customers with these factors how it would perform.But very pleased overall!!
I use it almost one year and work very well and right now my feeling my room air is very clean
It definitely filters well. The filter measure seems inaccurate considering we are at the worst level of forest fire smoke and it only shows that the air is bad when I cook

reviews.reviewTitle: The unit is smooth a quiet, do not know how long the filters will last or how much to replace.
reviews.reviewText: have only owned it for a couple weeks, but cleaned the smoke out of the air quickly and with a very reasonable noise volume, did not use it on high but no real need to. The unit is smooth a quiet compared to our old air purifier, do not know how long the filters will last or how much to replace
